title: Bitcoin (BTC/USD) Price Analysis Report – 22 June 2023
description: Introduction This report provides a comprehensive analysis of Bitcoin (BTC) for 22 June 2023. The data includes real-time price, volume, bid/ask, day’s range, technical indicators, and moving averages. title: Valkyrie Funds Joins Race for SEC Approval as It Files Application for Spot Bitcoin ETF
description: On Wednesday, Valkyrie Funds, a Tennessee-based asset manager offering a bitcoin futures exchange-traded fund (ETF), a defi fund, and a bitcoin mining industry ETF, filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for the launch of a spot bitcoin ETF. SEC Flooded With Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications as Valkyrie Funds Steps Into the Ring […]

title: Ramp Expands On-Ramp Service, Enabling Crypto Transactions with 40 New Fiat Currencies
description: Ramp, a leading financial technology company specializing in crypto infrastructure, has recently announced a significant expansion of its platform’s compatibility by adding support for 40 new fiat currencies. This move aims to simplify cross-border transactions and enable users to seamlessly transact with both digital and traditional currencies while benefiting from favorable conversion rates.
